What Iâ€™ll Be Working On
Hereâ€™s the problem Iâ€™m helping to solve: currently, QuTiP users often need to recreate common quantum system Hamiltonians from scratch, leading to duplicated effort and potential inconsistencies. My project aims to change that by creating a comprehensive library of ready-to-use implementations.
